catchBreathWhileDying: You can’t take the $t(maneuver:catchBreath, capitalize) maneuver in combat, and you are bleeding, and this condition can’t be removed in any way until you are no longer dying.
recoveriesWhileDying: Your allies can help you spend $t(recoveries, capitalize) in combat, and you can spend $t(recoveries, capitalize) out of combat as usual.
